comments.author: aleecia@aleecia.com
comments.creator: aleecia@aleecia.com
comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:2.0b12) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b12
Build Identifier: N/A (DNT feature in FF 4.0)

In the FAQ for the Do-not-track feature (see dnt.mozilla.org) we would like to have a pointer to two RSS feeds. One will contain all of the companies that have announced they will honor the Do-not-track header. The other is for companies that have announced they currently honor the Do-not-track header. Could someone please set these up and send me a pointer to where to update them internally? I would like this to go live with or before 4.0 if at all possible. Thanks!

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
N/A
Actual Results:  
N/A
